title: Sports Kit Number
author: Style Embroidery

comments.content:
Hello,

If you do wish to know the font please provide atleast 5 to 7 number or characters; so that we can help you better.

at this moment with the best of my ability the font is [De Bellis (Regular)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724121407/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Scriptorium-Fonts&ffam=DeBellis%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=9dfbb0760f7c25aa74a3f9ffc6e4dea7&wrap=2&text=7) &/or [Ondine LT (Regular) by Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724121407/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&nr=0&event=displayFontPackage&code=1300&newsample=7&view=View)

Thanks  
Regards,  
Hasnain

This is the only sample we have at the moment, Ondine will probably be a close enough match for now.

Thanks for you help
